summary: Completed Phase 2 testing: Mobile Optimization & Conversion Tools. All critical features verified working. Mobile filter drawer opens correctly on viewport <768px with all filters (Location, Category, Price Range, Sort By). Fee Savings Calculator displays on subscription page with interactive slider ($1K-$500K range). No-Cap fee logic verified via backend tests (14/16 passed). SellerTierBadge component properly integrated on lot detail pages.

minor.issue: Endpoint returns 404 - not implemented at this path. Subscription data is fetched via /api/auth/me instead.

critical_code_review_comments: Mobile filter drawer (Sheet component) correctly opens from left side on viewport <768px
Desktop filters remain inline on viewport >=768px
Fee Savings Calculator correctly calculates: Free (9% combined), Premium (6% combined - saves 3%), VIP (5% combined - saves 4%)
Slider range correct: $1,000 to $500,000 with $1,000 step
No-Cap fee logic verified: $100K item = $5K buyer (5%) + $4K seller (4%)
SellerTierBadge component properly shows Premium/VIP badges, returns null for free tier (correct behavior)
SellerTierBadge integrated at line 430 in MultiItemListingDetailPage.js
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 2 Mobile Optimization complete. Mobile filter drawer uses Shadcn Sheet component with side='left'. Fee Savings Calculator uses Shadcn Slider component. SellerTierBadge only displays for Premium/VIP sellers (returns null for free tier). Session cookies may expire between page navigations - login again if needed.
